title: For Sale N338-2 S.F. Hess SGC 50 SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale N338-2 S.F. Hess SGC 50 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Zach Rice
I am selling the below card, Curt Welch’s N338-2 S.F. Hess card. To date, this is the only example graded by SGC and one of the highest graded N338-2s. This card presents near-mint but suffers from a wrinkle in the bottom left corner. 

Many rank the rarity of the N338-2 set greater than the N690 Kalamazoo Bats (non-Giants and Mets) set and just under the N370 Lone Jack set. 


Zach Rice
Zacharyrice@sbcglobal.net
